subject: Skateboards
lead_paragraph: The Olympic snowboard gold medalist Shaun White won the skateboard vert event at the Dew Action Sports Tour’s Panasonic Open yesterday in Baltimore. On Friday night, the BMX dirt bike athlete Stephen Murray was injured while attempting a double backflip. He was taken to a hospital for surgery and was in critical but stable condition.
